review_title: Get this if you like Mahjongg!
one_reviews_text: This is quite polished and well worth the price.  I enjoy proceeding through the environment as I beat each group of boards - that's a nice touch.

I thought this would be a very simple, relaxing game without much challenge. This could hardly be farther from the truth. Getting on the leaderboard is a grueling process of continuous panic and honing your visual search skills as you strive to slice a few seconds off your time. Highly addictive. My main frustration is that, in a game where visual search is so important, a few of the animations creep into my field of view and disrupt my flow. Additionally, I don't really understand how the metrics used on the leaderboards work - I just keep trying to win boards fast and see my score improve but I don't know what it means. If the metrics were somehow shown/explained during the game it might be clearer. The single environment can also get a bit monotonous. But it's more than worth the modest price.
